author: hship
msg: Tiny change to exception handling when instantiating components and pages.
Add a JVM property to disable page pooling.

author: hship
msg: Add resetServiceEnabled property to AbstractApplication.  Add the IDirect interface.
Make sure the page is identified in a RequestCycleException, if a runtime exception

author: hship
msg: Implemented the <field-binding> element of the specification.  Allows a binding to
be expressed in terms of a Java class and a static field of that class.
Move the canonical Tapestry DTD to the tapestry.sourceforge.net website.

author: hship
msg: Implemented the <field-binding> element of the specification.  Allows a binding to
be expressed in terms of a Java class and a static field of that class.

author: hship
msg: Reorganized how Body and Rollover components work together, slightly, so that less Javascript
has to be stored in memory during the rendering of the Body's wrapped elements.
